title: Feng shui today: enrich your life by design: with Jami Lin
brief_description: Feng Shui- the ancient Chinese art of placement, and the creation of positive and harmonious living environments that enhance abundance and well being, has made the transition from East to West. Jami Lin; author and lecturer, combines her expertise in Feng Shui with interior design to create this practical video about Earth Design, an integration of interior design and self development that captures Feng Shui on the domestic front.
